attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to ask permission to change any UK flag on uniforms
attributes.additional_details: Due to the recent changes to the Union Flag, for sports teams (England football and Team GB), the petitioned legislation will remove the commercial companies having control over changing national flags of the UK.
attributes.background: Petition to make it a legal requirement to ask government and royal permission to change any UK flag on uniforms and kit representing the UK.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about sports kits are a matter for sports associations, not the UK Government or Parliament.
